attributes.action: Set up a new Bank without toxic dangerous and harmful debts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Invest our 50 billion into a NEW BANK free from the debts and the people responsible for creating such a destructive economic climate.

Only allow money to be invested into the UK economy or at most the european union. 
This will 1) Keep people in employment. 2) 100% of the capital will not be wasted on the Banks bad debt.
3) Solve the Housing market (people will be in employment so they will be able to pay thier mortgage. and finally we will be back to real a real monetary policy (producing real not illusionally and false capital)
No longer should we be deceived by the City Bankers.
